items.title: There’s Too Much of Everything
items.description: The deluge of entertainment and information in our era is diluting our enjoyment.

items.title: Trump Is Right. Christians Are Threatened Across the Globe
items.description: Christians are being punished and persecuted simply for living out their beliefs — and all of society loses out as a result. But none of this is inevi...

items.title: The Attacks on ICE Must Stop
items.description: The latest attack on an agency facility in Dallas is not an isolated incident.

items.title: Visiting a New University in Austin, Texas
items.description: Places like the University of Austin, driven by the Great Books, merit, and free inquiry, are part of the mix in changing higher ed’s tune.

items.title: Take It from Albuquerque: Free Transit Is a Bad Idea
items.description: Zohran Mamdani should get the hint and scrap his proposal for New York City.
